name: SalimQuest
description:
A simple Maze game made using Unity and C# for an assignment in Dawson College's Independent Video Game Design program.

I focused on art and narrative direction, creating the maze, the gem, the statues, the altar, the candles, the plinth, the debris, the environment details, the cloth (including its animations), and also designing the atmospheric and aesthetic directions. 

Made as a collaboration between myself, as well as my 3 peers below:
Carl Boisvert - https://carl-boisvert.itch.io/
Ricardo Lorenzo Garcia - https://lerickyraccoon.itch.io/
Charles-Antoine Solis - https://ytraboz.itch.io/
